name: Coloroid (Raúl López Martín, Javier Serra Campos, Christian Villanueva, Raul Moreno Tamayo)
name_original: Coloroid (Raúl López Martín, Javier Serra Campos, Christian Villanueva, Raul Moreno Tamayo)
description:
Game made for the MiniJam 73 with a limitation of only five colors on screen at a time.

HOW TO PLAY!

  • W for forward acceleration.
  • A and D to rotate the spaceship.
  • Left and right to rotate the turret.
  • Space to Shoot.
  • You can also change the control inside the game!
  • You can only destroy Asteroids while being on the same color: "Y"ellow, "B"lue, "G"reen, "P"ink and "R"ed.
  • Careful with the UFOs
